includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: A woman turns up in a bag in NYC, covered in tattoos and with no memory of her past. Mystery crime drama with Sullivan Stapleton and Jaimie Alexander.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A woman turns up in a bag in NYC, covered in tattoos and with no memory of her past. Mystery crime drama with Sullivan Stapleton and Jaimie Alexander.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A woman turns up in a bag in NYC, covered in tattoos and with no memory of her past. Mystery crime drama with Sullivan Stapleton and Jaimie Alexander.

includedAssets.title: A Stray Howl
includedAssets.synopsis: A tattoo on Jane's body points Weller and his team to a pilot with a traumatic past and a lethal plan. Meanwhile, a chilling flashback haunts Jane.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A tattoo on Jane's body points Weller and his team to a pilot with a traumatic past and a lethal plan. Meanwhile, a chilling flashback haunts Jane.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A tattoo on Jane's body points Weller and his team to a pilot with a traumatic past and a lethal plan. Meanwhile, a chilling flashback haunts Jane.

includedAssets.title: Eight Slim Grins
includedAssets.synopsis: The team are curious when a jewel thief is captured with the same Navy SEAL tattoo as Jane's. Meanwhile, Jane receives an ambiguous message.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team are curious when a jewel thief is captured with the same Navy SEAL tattoo as Jane's. Meanwhile, Jane receives an ambiguous message.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team are curious when a jewel thief is captured with the same Navy SEAL tattoo as Jane's. Meanwhile, Jane receives an ambiguous message.

includedAssets.title: Bone May Rot
includedAssets.synopsis: A tattoo leads the FBI to uncover a plot with potentially catastrophic global consequences. Weller talks to Jane about the day she disappeared.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A tattoo leads the FBI to uncover a plot with potentially catastrophic global consequences. Weller talks to Jane about the day she disappeared.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A tattoo leads the FBI to uncover a plot with potentially catastrophic global consequences. Weller talks to Jane about the day she disappeared.

includedAssets.title: Split The Law
includedAssets.synopsis: The CIA and the FBI come to blows when a hostage crisis takes an unexpected turn. Jane gets further flashbacks when she meets Weller's sister.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The CIA and the FBI come to blows when a hostage crisis takes an unexpected turn. Jane gets further flashbacks when she meets Weller's sister.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The CIA and the FBI come to blows when a hostage crisis takes an unexpected turn. Jane gets further flashbacks when she meets Weller's sister.

includedAssets.title: Cede Your Soul
includedAssets.synopsis: Mayfair expresses concerns about Weller's personal involvement in Jane's case. Meanwhile, a Saudi prince is assasinated on US soil.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mayfair expresses concerns about Weller's personal involvement in Jane's case. Meanwhile, a Saudi prince is assassinated on US soil.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mayfair expresses concerns about Weller's personal involvement in Jane's case. Meanwhile, a Saudi prince is assasinated on US soil.

includedAssets.title: Sent On Tour
includedAssets.synopsis: Jane and Weller are sent to a secessionist town to capture a dangerous criminal. Patterson risks everything to solve further tattoo puzzles.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jane and Weller are sent to a secessionist town to capture a dangerous criminal. Patterson risks everything to solve further tattoo puzzles.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jane and Weller are sent to a secessionist town to capture a dangerous criminal. Patterson risks everything to solve further tattoo puzzles.

includedAssets.title: Presecute Envoys
includedAssets.synopsis: The murder of two police officers appears to have links to one of Jane's tattoos. Meanwhile, Mayfair reflects on her chequered past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The murder of two police officers appears to have links to one of Jane's tattoos. Meanwhile, Mayfair reflects on her chequered past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The murder of two police officers appears to have links to one of Jane's tattoos. Meanwhile, Mayfair reflects on her chequered past.

includedAssets.title: Authentic Flirt
includedAssets.synopsis: Jane and Weller go undercover as married assassins to infiltrate a deadly black market deal. Elsewhere, David treads on dangerous ground.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jane and Weller go undercover as married assassins to infiltrate a deadly black market deal. Elsewhere, David treads on dangerous ground.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jane and Weller go undercover as married assassins to infiltrate a deadly black market deal. Elsewhere, David treads on dangerous ground.

includedAssets.title: Evil Handmade Instrument
includedAssets.synopsis: Still reeling from recent events, the team hunt down a unit of reactivated sleeper agents planning a series of assassinations.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Still reeling from recent events, the team hunt down a unit of reactivated sleeper agents planning a series of assassinations.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Still reeling from recent events, the team hunt down a unit of reactivated sleeper agents planning a series of assassinations.

includedAssets.title: Cease Forcing Enemy
includedAssets.synopsis: The thrilling US drama returns from the mid-season break. Now that the mystery artist has been revealed, what further secrets lie in Jane's past? (S1, ep 11)
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The thrilling US drama returns. Now that the mystery artist has been revealed, what further secrets lie in Jane's past? (S1, ep 11)
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The thrilling US drama returns from the mid-season break. Now that the mystery artist has been revealed, what further secrets lie in Jane's past? (S1, ep 11)

includedAssets.title: Scientist Hollow Fortune
includedAssets.synopsis: Scientist Hollow Fortune: Jane recalls her mysterious past in the military when the team uncover a sinister plot.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Scientist Hollow Fortune: Jane recalls her mysterious past in the military when the team uncover a sinister plot.

includedAssets.title: Erase Weary Youth
includedAssets.synopsis: When the team receives a tip off that there is a mole in the FBI, Jane fears her secrets may be revealed.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When the team receives a tip off that there is a mole in the FBI, Jane fears her secrets may be revealed.

includedAssets.title: Rules In Defiance
includedAssets.synopsis: Zapata goes undercover when an anonymous tip leads the team to an urgent death row case. Meanwhile, Jane questions her role in the FBI.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Zapata goes undercover when an anonymous tip leads the team to an urgent death row case. Meanwhile, Jane questions her role in the FBI.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Zapata goes undercover when an anonymous tip leads the team to an urgent death row case. Meanwhile, Jane questions her role in the FBI.

includedAssets.title: Older Cutthroat Canyon
includedAssets.synopsis: What begins as an art gallery heist turns into a direct threat to the team, causing Jane to go into hiding.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: What begins as an art gallery heist turns into a direct threat to the team, causing Jane to go into hiding.

includedAssets.title: Any Wounded Thief
includedAssets.synopsis: An armoured car full of chemical weapons is stolen, and it's a race against time for the team to prevent a deadly attack from taking place.

includedAssets.title: Mans Telpathic Loyal Lookouts

includedAssets.synopsis: A hidden message found in the New York Times crossword puzzle leads the team into dangerous waters.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A hidden message found in the New York Times crossword puzzle leads the team into dangerous waters.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A hidden message found in the New York Times crossword puzzle leads the team into dangerous waters.

includedAssets.title: One Begets Technique
includedAssets.synopsis: The team reluctantly work with a previous target in order to trap an international criminal.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team reluctantly work with a previous target in order to trap an international criminal.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team reluctantly work with a previous target in order to trap an international criminal.

includedAssets.title: In The Comet Of Us
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep19 - In The Comet Of Us
includedAssets.synopsis: An investigation into one of Jane's tattoos takes an unexpected turn when the team become involved in a shooting on a college campus.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An investigation into one of Jane's tattoos takes an unexpected turn when the team become involved in a shooting on a college campus.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An investigation into one of Jane's tattoos takes an unexpected turn when the team become involved in a shooting on a college campus.

includedAssets.title: Swift Hardhearted Stone
includedAssets.synopsis: A girl with ties to a terrorist organisation falls into the care of the team. Meanwhile, a conflicted Jane grows closer to Wellar.

includedAssets.title: Of Whose Uneasy Route
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep21 - Of Whose Uneasy Route
includedAssets.synopsis: When hackers infiltrate the FBI and the SIOC building goes into lockdown, the team have to look past their differences to escape.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When hackers infiltrate the FBI and the SIOC building goes into lockdown, the team have to look past their differences to escape.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When hackers infiltrate the FBI and the SIOC building goes into lockdown, the team have to look past their differences to escape.

includedAssets.title: If Love A Rebel, Death Will Render
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep22 - If Love A Rebel, Death Will Render
includedAssets.synopsis: When an abandoned child is found with a tattoo identical to one of Jane's, the team must scramble save dozens of newborns.

includedAssets.title: Why Await Life's End
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep23 - Why Await Life's End
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season finale, Weller searches for the truth, but finds only heartbreak, while Jane reaches out for help with Oscar.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A Jane Doe is discovered in Times Square with no memory of who she is, but with a body covered in mysterious tattoos, each one linked to a crime. Jaimie Alexander stars in this hit US crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A Jane Doe (Jaimie Alexander) is discovered in Times Square with no memory of who she is, but covered in mysterious tattoos, each linked to a crime.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A Jane Doe is discovered in Times Square with no memory of who she is, but with a body covered in mysterious tattoos, each one linked to a crime. Jaimie Alexander stars in this hit US crime drama.

includedIn.title: Blindspot
includedIn.synopsis: A Jane Doe is discovered in Times Square with no memory of who she is, but with a body covered in mysterious tattoos. The FBI soon finds each tattoo leads to a crime they must solve.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The FBI discover a Jane Doe with no memory of who she is, but with a body covered in mysterious tattoos that each lead to a crime.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A Jane Doe is discovered in Times Square with no memory of who she is, but with a body covered in mysterious tattoos. The FBI soon finds each tattoo leads to a crime they must solve.
